wikipedia_page.main: Frederick William Groves (13 January 1891 – 1965) was an English professional football forward, who played in the Football League for Brighton & Hove Albion, Arsenal, Glossop and Charlton Athletic. He made over 130 appearances for Arsenal in wartime football.

response: *Frederick Groves (footballer, born 1891), English footballer who played for Glossop, Arsenal, Brighton and Charlton Athletic
*Frederick Groves (footballer, born 1892) (1892–1980), English footballer who played for Huddersfield Town, Sheffield United and Pontypridd
